channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: Uh oh. https://t.co/O1UYukGmyy

Twitter needs a ‚ÄúThis tweet has been dunked on enough already!‚Äù warning label.
A quick mockup. https://t.co/105d4VLEu8
A better mockup would have a basketball hoop icon for the ‚ÄúView current dunks‚Äù option.
A more serious way that Twitter could do it is to alter the Quote Tweet function so that it notes how many quote tweets already exist, and offer people the option to look at them first and just retweet one of those.
@CatherineOmega Do we have someone to name this law of headlines after? You know what happens if we don‚Äôt, right?
So far, 2022 is flying by. https://t.co/tUSj2nBZgj

*Owen Wilson Wow* https://t.co/N569CzrdcR
üçø https://t.co/OLGj03BehB
üçø https://t.co/ZiVHkDtuwA
I could still use more specific dates on when not to tell my crushes I‚Äôm in love with them, but this at least gives me some idea of how to plan that. https://t.co/TtaBgEvfVU
I finally bought an air fryer. I surrender!
Is there anything that isn‚Äôt in crisis these days?
@AnakanaSchofiel How do they know when the most inopportune moment is? The car tires, I mean.

Like movies? Like sports? Live in Toronto? Then you might also like @PaidInSweat, a film program specializing in sports-esque, and sports-adjacent films curated by @nostalgiaphile, screening at @RevueCinema.
Is this a lot of streetcars? https://t.co/TEaCQiIUGs

@CatherineOmega @Kimli I caved and I‚Äôm giving work what it wants: A slightly less happy employee. They framed it as protecting my personal information (if a matter goes before a court and my laptop is subpoenaed, etc. etc.), though well, well after the fact.
@DumasRaphael If it were me, I‚Äôd be tempted to write back ‚ÄúNot sure if I‚Äôll be at the party. Can you tell me now?‚Äù
@Kimli Welcome to my world. https://t.co/CxreGlVWms

Ever since watching Dark City, I can‚Äôt stop thinking about this quote from Roger Ebert‚Äôs review of the movie: ‚ÄúI realized the last dozen films I‚Äôd seen were about people standing around, talking to one another.‚Äù https://t.co/jZuiVhOfhC
Since reading that, I realized that I could stop watching a lot of movies and just listen to them.
This came to mind when watching the interviews in Quintin Smith‚Äôs ‚ÄúMaking Sense of VRChat‚Äù video. Ultimately, watching it was valuable, but there‚Äôs so much (virtual) standing around and talking to one another that you can get a lot out of just the audio. https://t.co/Cqidjsezdo
Maybe, for video, I could use a prompt for the times when I really should watch and for the times when I can get everything from just listening.
I‚Äôm pretty sure the only reason I haven‚Äôt shaved my beard off is because people will point out that I shaved it and ask why. https://t.co/sNcO2Zm77q
@RagnarHeidar @uni_iceland @isavia @flightradar24 Here‚Äôs one for you, @lemonodor. üëÜüèª
@Stv https://t.co/7NX92StonW
I‚Äôm going with yes, and will work to reduce my appreciation of art.
This is my aesthetic. https://t.co/RI1SzDeVfu
My bot @fullyjabbedCA is a GitHub Action. Really. https://t.co/88ySbLDM2m
@skinnylatte I heard KG killed when she rolled through Toronto. I‚Äôm kicking myself for not going to that show.

4 years later and I‚Äôm at another Sianspheric show.
Siansfuckingpheric. https://t.co/Qd42P8qAO5
One of the band members has an Aphex Twin sticker on his guitar. That‚Äôs how I can tell he‚Äôs cool.
It‚Äôs possible, for fucking once, that I made a friend at a concert. I saw a guy who I was pretty sure came alone (I was right), and invited him to sit with me. He initially declined, but then came over and thanked me and talked to me every now and then throughout the show.
That‚Äôs a family trait, by the way: We believe we have a sense for people who look like they‚Äôd rather not be standing and offer them a seat, but then they politely decline.
If you‚Äôre wondering whether @sianspheric killed tonight, well, check out this thread and you tell me. https://t.co/b4R242BULB
Briefly: Yes it is.
New series: ‚ÄúRemember When?‚Äù
